functional_jobs.job_statement: When I am landscaping my backyard, I want to ensure proper drainage, so I can protect my landscaping from severe weather.
functional_jobs.current_solution: We installed drains during our landscaping project.
functional_jobs.pain_points: Some ground cover is being lost to the street during heavy rain.
functional_jobs.desired_outcomes: Minimal loss of ground cover and effective drainage.
functional_jobs.success_criteria: The drainage system prevents significant water damage and maintains landscaping integrity.

emotional_jobs.job_statement: When I host events or complete projects, I want to feel accomplished and proud, so I can enjoy my home and share it with others.
emotional_jobs.current_solution: Successfully completing home renovations and hosting gatherings.
emotional_jobs.pain_points: Feeling stressed when contractors are delayed or materials are not ready.
emotional_jobs.desired_outcomes: A sense of pride and satisfaction in my home and projects.
emotional_jobs.success_criteria: Positive feedback from guests and personal satisfaction with the completed work.

social_jobs.job_statement: When I engage with my community, I want to be perceived as knowledgeable and helpful, so I can foster connections and friendships.
social_jobs.current_solution: Participating in community events and contributing ideas for improvements.
social_jobs.pain_points: Feeling out of touch or uninformed about local resources and events.
social_jobs.desired_outcomes: Being seen as a reliable source of information and support within my community.
social_jobs.success_criteria: Increased social interactions and recognition as a community leader.

supporting_jobs.job_statement: When I move to a new area, I want to quickly learn about local services and resources, so I can settle in comfortably.
supporting_jobs.current_solution: Networking with other newcomers and using local guides.
supporting_jobs.pain_points: Struggling to find reliable information about essential services like healthcare and utilities.
supporting_jobs.desired_outcomes: Access to a comprehensive newcomer's guide that outlines important local information.
supporting_jobs.success_criteria: Feeling confident and informed about local services and having a smooth transition into the new community.
